text:
Oh lovely! Yea that's a pretty fun idea for a body mechanics shot. I like the the detail of him tapping the door to look for the handle and the poses in general.
As for feedback, the moment in which he slinks through the door after opening it feels odd, as it happens twice and kind of breaks his neck. Maybe you could make him curl inwards in a mischievous way just to give more character.
When he's searching for the handle it would help to have him look around more with his head, right now he's pretty still as if focusing on something past the camera and not giving the impression of being cautious of everything.
Also it would be nice to see him peeking through the gap immediately after slipping through the door, just to sell that character even more.
ahh okayyy, thank you. Makes sense! I'll implement that feedback for sure! :slightly_smiling_face:
Hope you had a nice Easter break btw!
